Entries.Penny_*_BeforeMovie: Watching a film with mum sure brings me back!
Entries.Penny_dislike_AfterMovie: Sorry if I ruined the film for you, it just wasn't really my favourite...
Entries.Krobus_fall_movie_0_BeforeMovie: Psst... Hey, it's me, Krobus. Could you recognise me?$8#$b#If anyone approaches us, you do the talking, okay?$8
Entries.Krobus_*_BeforeMovie: *ahem*... Hello! I am very excited to be at the visual entertainment centre and to consume the popped corn... just like you!$8#$b#*whisper*... how am I doing?$8
Entries.George_like_BeforeMovie: Hmmph... The pictures aren't like they used to be... But the quality might be good enough.
Entries.George_like_AfterMovie: Heh. Compared to most films these days, it wasn't bad.$h
Entries.George_dislike_AfterMovie: Shameful! The rubbish they pass for 'films' these days...
Entries.Evelyn_love_BeforeMovie: Before this cinema came to town, I hadn't seen a movie in twenty years!$h
Entries.Evelyn_like_AfterMovie: I'm glad they're still making decent films... I had a lot of fun!
Entries.Evelyn_like_BeforeMovie: It's very kind of you to invite an old lady to the pictures.$h
Entries.Evelyn_dislike_BeforeMovie: I've never been a fan of scary films, but I'll try to keep an open mind.
Entries.Abigail_summer_movie_0_BeforeMovie: I can't believe they made a Prairie King film... I hope it's good!
Entries.Abigail_love_BeforeMovie: I love horror films... I hope it's scary!$h
Entries.Abigail_like_BeforeMovie: Hey! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the cinema.$h
Entries.Caroline_summer_movie_0_BeforeMovie: I've always loved films about the wild west, so I'm really excited to see this!
Entries.Caroline_love_BeforeMovie: This film looks so cute, I was really hoping someone would invite me!
Entries.Harvey_love_BeforeMovie: I read a glowing review of this film in the Zuzu City Times...
Entries.Harvey_like_BeforeMovie: I don't watch a lot of films, but this one's been well-received, right?
Entries.Gus_summer_movie_1_BeforeMovie: I saw an advert for this on the TV. It looks really funny!
Entries.Gus_winter_movie_0_BeforeMovie: It doesn't feel like winter until you've seen '{0'!
Entries.Gus_winter_movie_0_AfterMovie: That was heart-warming... and somehow they make that fabled fruit seem so delicious. I'd love to taste it one day.
Entries.Gus_fall_movie_0_BeforeMovie: They say this film is 'unconventional'... does that mean it's bad?$s
Entries.Lewis_summer_movie_0_BeforeMovie: I watched cowboy films when I was a kid... I'm glad to see the art is still alive!
Entries.Lewis_like_BeforeMovie: As mayor, I need to know what kinds of films are being shown in our community. We have the tender minds of the next generation to worry about!
Entries.Lewis_spring_movie_1_BeforeMovie: The governor himself recommended this film to me!
Entries.Jodi_love_BeforeMovie: I saw this film once, a long time ago. It's very romantic!
Entries.Jodi_love_AfterMovie: That was lovely... The theme of the film really resonated with me. Thanks for bringing me!
Entries.Jodi_like_AfterMovie: I'm not much of a film buff... but I had a good time! Thanks, @.
Entries.Sam_summer_movie_1_DuringMovie: This film's hilarious! How do they come up with this stuff?$h
Entries.Sam_horror_BeforeMovie: So you like scary films, huh? I'm a little surprised!
Entries.Sam_horror_AfterMovie: That was pretty good! I'm usually not scared by films, but that one got to me a little... I don't think I'll take Vincent to see this.
Entries.Sam_like_BeforeMovie: Hey, thanks for inviting me, @... It's really great that we have a cinema in town now.
Entries.Sam_dislike_BeforeMovie: It's an old film with lots of talking, right? Hmm... $s
Entries.Sam_dislike_DuringMovie: Huh? Oh! Yeah... The film's... interesting...$10
Entries.Vincent_love_BeforeMovie: I'm so excited! My mum said I can have sweets, too!$h
Entries.Vincent_dislike_BeforeMovie: B... But... This film is for grown-ups, isn't it?$s
Entries.Kent_like_BeforeMovie: Thanks for inviting me to the cinema, @. It's not easy to adjust back into the civilian lifestyle, but you've helped me feel really welcome.
Entries.Kent_like_AfterMovie: That was fun. When you're engrossed in a film, all your cares and worries disappear.
Entries.Kent_dislike_BeforeMovie: I'm not sure about this film...
Entries.Clint_winter_movie_1_BeforeMovie: This film's supposed to be a romance, right? *sigh*$s
Entries.Clint_like_BeforeMovie: I guess it's "boys' night", huh? Does that mean I have to buy my own snacks?^Oh... A... Are we on a date, then?$4
Entries.Emily_love_BeforeMovie: When I saw the film poster for this one, I felt a very positive sensation in the top of my head.$h
Entries.Emily_love_AfterMovie: That film felt very spiritual, in a way... don't you agree? I loved it!$h
Entries.Emily_like_BeforeMovie: I'm happy to see a film with you! I tend to get totally lost in the screen.
Entries.Emily_like_AfterMovie: I feel positive after that one... that means it was a good film!$h
Entries.Emily_dislike_BeforeMovie: I usually go to more positive films, so this will be interesting.
Entries.Emily_dislike_DuringMovie: Yoba, please protect me from the dark energy of this film.$7
Entries.Haley_winter_movie_1_BeforeMovie: Mmm... It's nice and warm in here. Winter is my favourite time to go to the cinema.$h
Entries.Haley_winter_movie_0_BeforeMovie: Mmm... It's nice and warm in here. Winter is my favourite time to go to the cinema.$h
Entries.Haley_dislike_BeforeMovie: Oh, is this one of those 'fantasy' films?$7
Entries.Haley_dislike_AfterMovie: *yawn*... What? Oh... what was that film about, again?$7
Entries.Haley_like_BeforeMovie: Everyone's talking about this film, so I've been wanting to see it.
Entries.Maru_summer_movie_1_BeforeMovie: It's a sci-fi film, right? One of the things I like about sci-fi is seeing all the weird technologies they come up with.
Entries.Maru_like_BeforeMovie: I really like going to the cinema, even if the movie's bad!$h
Entries.Sebastian_love_BeforeMovie: Hey. I heard this film is pretty grim... I'm looking forward to it.$h
Entries.Sebastian_love_AfterMovie: Best film I've seen in a while... I wonder how they did some of those special effects?$h
Entries.Sebastian_like_BeforeMovie: *shrugs*... The film poster looked pretty cool, so I'm in.
Entries.Sebastian_dislike_AfterMovie: It's probably a fine film for the target audience, but it's just not for me.
Entries.Robin_love_BeforeMovie: I've been feeling kind of dull lately, so an action-packed film is exactly what I need.
Entries.Robin_like_BeforeMovie: I'm not sure what this film's about, but I don't really care! It's just good to get out of the house.
Entries.Demetrius_summer_movie_1_BeforeMovie: This film supposedly takes place in a 'futuristic' society... it will be interesting to see what that looks like!
Entries.Demetrius_summer_movie_1_AfterMovie: Great film... but I wonder if there really is life beyond this planet?
Entries.Demetrius_like_BeforeMovie: Even if a film is bad, it's interesting to analyse.
Entries.Dwarf_love_AfterMovie: I didn't understand a thing, but the flashing lights were mesmerising!
Entries.Marnie_love_BeforeMovie: I know I'm going to love this film! It was really nice of you to invite me, @.$h
Entries.Marnie_like_BeforeMovie: I'm pretty easy-going when it comes to films... I like just about everything!
Entries.Shane_love_AfterMovie: When you're watching a good film, you can forget about everything else... That's a gift.
Entries.Jas_love_BeforeMovie: I'm really happy to see a film!
Entries.Jas_like_BeforeMovie: This is a grown-up movie, right? I'll be okay!
This is a grown-up film, right? I'll be okay!
Entries.Leah_love_BeforeMovie: I'm really intrigued by this film... I'm a sucker for the mysterious.
Entries.Leah_like_BeforeMovie: I'm not sure what to expect with this film, but I'm going to keep an open mind!
Entries.Leah_like_AfterMovie: From the film poster, this one looks pretty cheesy.
Entries.Willy_like_BeforeMovie: Heh heh... I'd never turn down a free film!
Entries.Leo_love_AfterMovie: Did you see that? They showed the Fern Islands... that's where I'm from!$h
Entries.Leo_like_DuringMovie: Leo seems very interested in the film.
